name: Scared Of The Dark (ActedWarrior)
description:
A small demo of a game a friend and I are producing for one of our classes.

There are campfires around the second level, press x or e to make a spawn point at them. When you reach the end you get sent back to the main menu screen

Controls 

WASD or Arrow keys to move 

Z or Shift to dash

X or E to interact 

Press R to Restart
